msItem.filiation: This homily contains parallels to Oxford Bodleian Library, Bodley 340 and 342 (Ker 309); BL Cotton Tiberius A.iii, fls. 2-173, CCCC 198 (Ker 48); CCCC 162 (Ker 38); CCCC 303 (Ker 57)

handNote.p: Main hand. Three types of s, various types of y.
